languages.text: "Это была... прекрасная речь! Благодарю вас!" {n}Руолдо шумно вздыхает, промакивая лицо платочком.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Это была... прекрасная речь! Благодарю вас!" {n}Промокнув лицо платочком, шумно вздыхает Руолдо.{/n}

languages.text: "That was... a grand speech! Thank you!" {n}Ruoldo sniffles loudly, dabbing his face with a handkercher.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Это была... прекрасная речь! Благодарю вас!" {n}Руолдо шумно вздыхает, промакивая лицо платочком.{/n}

"That was... a grand speech! Thank you!" {n}Ruoldo sniffles loudly, dabbing his face with a handkercher.{/n}

languages.text: “这可真是场……伟大的演讲！谢谢您！”{n}罗尔多大声地吸了吸鼻子，用手帕擦着脸。{/n}
languages.original_text: "That was... a grand speech! Thank you!" {n}Ruoldo sniffles loudly, dabbing his face with a handkercher.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “这可真是场……伟大的演讲！谢谢您！”{n}罗尔多大声地吸了吸鼻子，用手帕擦着脸。{/n}

languages.text: «¡Ha sido... un discurso grandioso! ¡Muchas gracias!». {n}Ruoldo sorbe ruidosamente por la nariz y se seca la cara con un pañuelo.{/n}
languages.original_text: "That was... a grand speech! Thank you!" {n}Ruoldo sniffles loudly, dabbing his face with a handkercher.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Ha sido... un discurso grandioso! ¡Muchas gracias!». {n}Ruoldo sorbe ruidosamente por la nariz y se seca la cara con un pañuelo.{/n}

languages.text: "Bu... Muhteşem bir konuşmaydı! Teşekkür ederiz!" {n}Ruoldo, mendiliyle yüzünü silerek duyulur şekilde burnunu çekiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "That was... a grand speech! Thank you!" {n}Ruoldo sniffles loudly, dabbing his face with a handkercher.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Bu... Muhteşem bir konuşmaydı! Teşekkür ederiz!" {n}Ruoldo, mendiliyle yüzünü silerek duyulur şekilde burnunu çekiyor.{/n}

languages.text: 「なんと…素晴らしいスピーチです！ありがとうございます！」{n}ルオルドは音を立てて鼻をすすり、ハンカチで顔を押さえる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "That was... a grand speech! Thank you!" {n}Ruoldo sniffles loudly, dabbing his face with a handkercher.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「なんと…素晴らしいスピーチです！ありがとうございます！」{n}ルオルドは音を立てて鼻をすすり、ハンカチで顔を押さえる。{/n}

languages.text: « Quel... magnifique discours ! Merci infiniment ! » {n}Ruoldo renifle bruyamment tout en se tamponnant le visage avec un mouchoir.{/n}
languages.original_text: "That was... a grand speech! Thank you!" {n}Ruoldo sniffles loudly, dabbing his face with a handkercher.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Quel... magnifique discours ! Merci infiniment ! » {n}Ruoldo renifle bruyamment tout en se tamponnant le visage avec un mouchoir.{/n}

languages.text: "Das war ... eine großartige Rede! Danke!" {n}Ruoldo schnieft vernehmlich und tupft sich das Gesicht mit einem Taschentuch ab.{/n}
